```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#Load requiered packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(jsonlite)
library(httr)
library(stringr)
```

#Check amount of interactions
```{r}
number <- GET(url = "http://dgidb.genome.wustl.edu", path = "api/v2/interactions") %>% .$content %>% rawToChar() %>% fromJSON() %>% .$`_meta` %>% .$total_count

number
```

#Access all interactions
```{r}
dgidb_expt <- GET(url = "http://dgidb.genome.wustl.edu", path = paste0("api/v2/interactions?count=", number, "&page=1")) %>% .$content %>% rawToChar() %>% fromJSON() %>% .$records %>% as.tibble()
```

#Save data
```{r}
save(dgidb_expt, file = "dgidb_export.Rdata")
```
